articles.title: European stocks fall as Deutsche Bank leads rout in banks - Reuters
articles.description: Banking stocks fell sharply in Europe on Friday with heavyweights Deutsche Bank and UBS Group pummelled by worries that the worst problems in the sector since the 2008 financial crisis have not yet been contained.
articles.content: March 24 (Reuters) - Banking stocks fell sharply in Europe on Friday with heavyweights Deutsche Bank and UBS Group pummelled by worries that the worst problems in the sector since the 2008 financial … [+4972 chars]
